# British economy and population: an overview

## Core

+ [Stephen Broadberry, Bruce M. S. Campbell, Alexander Klein, Mark Overton and Bas van Leeuwen, "Prologue: Historical national income accounting", *British Economic Growth, 1270-1870*, CUP: 2015.](https://keats.kcl.ac.uk/mod/resource/view.php?id=3063802){target="_blank"}
+ [E. A. Wrigley, Chapter 2 "The divergence of England: the growth of the English economy in the seventeenth and eighteenth centuries," in *Poverty, Progress and Population*, CUP: 2004.](https://ebookcentral.proquest.com/lib/kcl/reader.action?docID=255180&ppg=60){target="_blank"}
+ [Nicholas Crafts, "Forging Ahead and Falling Behind: The Rise and Relative Decline of the First Industrial Nation," *Journal of Economic Perspectives*, Vol. 12, No. 2, 1998.](https://www.jstor.org/stable/2646970){target="_blank"}
